1.content:
In the world around us today, we watch as technology takes us to places we could never have gone before and allows us to see the world through the eyes of others. In the city of Geonopolis a strange new invention is founded. It has the power to rearrange matter to a small size and preserve it's functional aspects.

It was a natural step on from Teleportation. Teleportation allowed the transportation of matter between two points but now the Center for Research in Trade, based out of Genopolis University has discovered that it is extremely useful for the downsizing of containers used in sea, land and air post.

The technology was being used well. It was directly linked with the drop in price of imported goods and revolutionized storage facilities. This was the case until a handful of rouge scientists (only known as The Rose Group) took the technology to use as their own. The Goverment then took direct action by using the technology for it's secret services.

Now in a world of uncertainty the citizens of Genopolis will have their lives changed forever by the The Rose Group.

info.description:
This is a compilation of all the stories in my portfolio. Soon it will be my only one!
Please stick with me whilst I perform this update.

Everyone gets 100GP's on his or her first addition to this story and, more with every addition following. I also give out GP's for originality.


Check out my message board: "Message place"   by lillyfox (61)
Feel free to use this if you don't have time to make an addition but want to have some input! (inserting the numerical choice path would be good also)


Competition

For users who make 10 or more additions I will list you on this page. At the end of each month I will roll the virtual dice and the person who's number comes up wins 1,000Gift Points + a random amount between 0 and 500 Gift Points.

The list is ordered by the most recent adder. If you don't keep adding you will be bumped off the list (ie I'm trying to encourage consistency rather than quantity).

Newbies, this is a good chance for exposure. I am going to comment on your style and ideas

I will announce the winners on this page. I will not limit wins in any way other than making sure that I don't go Giftprupt in the process.

Last Update:13/02/07
